dmca.title: Trademark DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google: Android Market

works.description:
It has come to our knowledge that a  
fake/counterfeit application of our iPhone game Touchgrind BMX can be
found  
on Android market.

The seller is using our trademark and copyrighted material, such as our  
name, our icon and our screenshots copied directly from the Apple App  
Store, and we have not even made the Android version of the game yet. The 

seller is therefore violating the use of our trademark as well as the use 

of copyrighted content. (Also, the application does not even start, very  
bad marketing for us)

We want this to be removed from the Android market immediately or we won't
 
hesitate to take this one step further if necessary. Please contact us as 

soon as you have taken care of this matter.
